entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High 12.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 12. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Sunday 16 April 2023
